result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

OFF THE RECORD / 1:42 PM Defendant Starla Angel Robertson is in court.  Attorney Cheryl Marie Gill appeared by video for Starla Angel Robertson.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.    Justice Point Representative, H. Lessard indicates spoke to DEF and she's enroute.   Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Supervision Report - Justice Point

2:36 PM Defendant Starla Angel Robertson in court.  Attorney Cheryl Marie Gill appeared by video for Starla Angel Robertson. Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and recites appearances.  Court reviews supervision report.  Attny Gill request adjournment.  Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Status conference scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on September 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Supervision Report - Justice Point

2:43 PM Defendant Starla Angel Robertson in court.  Attorney Cheryl Gill not in court.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and recites appearances.   DEF indicates no contact with Attny Gill since last hearing 3/25/2022.  Court reviews court record in all cases.  Discussion takes place regarding her Justice Point appointments.    2:52 PM OFF THE RECORD:  DEF to report to Justice Point for test.   3:04 PM  BACK ON THE RECORD:   Test results negative.  Court issues a new date.   Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.
Status conference scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on May 31, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Supervision Report - Justice Report
Status conference on April 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Starla Angel Robertson in court with attorney Cheryl Marie Gill appears by zoom.  Defendant Starla Angel Robertson in custody appears by video.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by zoom for the State of Wisconsin.    Court calls case and recites appearances.  DEF agrees to move forward, with no information filed.  State to file information, exact to criminal complaint.   Atty Gill acknowledged receipt of information and waives reading.  DEF entered NG plea to Counts 1, 2, and 3.

11:06 AM Defendant Starla Angel Robertson in court with attorney Cheryl Marie Gill appears by zoom.  Defendant Starla Angel Robertson in custody appears by video.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by zoom for the State of Wisconsin.    Court calls case and recites appearances. 11:10 OFF THE RECORD:  Atty Gill indicates recently appointed, and requests break out room meeting with DEF.    11:14 BACK ON THE RECORD:   Attny Gill indicates waiver of preliminary of hearing.        Atty  Gill indicates DEF waives preliminary hearing.  Court advised the DEF as to her right to prelim.  DEF does not wish to have prelim.  Court finds defendant freely waived her right to prelim finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.  Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on March 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.

8:44AM Defendant Starla Angel Robertson in court, appearing by video from custody in Sawyer County Jail, with attorney Cheryl Marie Gill, not appearing.  Atty Stephanie Thomas-Schmidt is making a special appearance.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court calls case and recites appearances.    DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  COurt enters NG plea on behalf of DEF.  Atty Thomas-Schmidt request prelim.  Court sets prelim for 3/25/22 at 11AM.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Attny Cheryl Gill
copy of VIOLATED BOND 21CF47

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-338-3976 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.

Court inquires about signature bond.  State indicates reports in office not paired with PC statement.  Court has discussion with DEF.   Court modifies bond.  CBS  $200  same conditions.
